60 template <class T>
61 void cramer( // Solve linear system using Cramer's rule
62  std::vector< std::vector < T > > &, // (input) coeff. matrix
63  std::vector< T > &, // (input) source term
64  std::vector< T > & // (input/output) solution
65 );
66 
67 template <class T, size_t m, size_t n>
68 void cramer( // Solve linear system using Cramer's rule
69  std::array< std::array < T, n >, m > &, // (input) coeff. matrix
70  std::array< T, m > &, // (input) source term
71  std::array< T, n > & // (input/output) solution
72 );
73 
74 unsigned int factorizeLU( // LU decomposition of matrix
75  std::vector<std::vector<double>> &, // (input) Input matrix
76  std::vector<std::vector<double>> &, // (input/output) L factor
77  std::vector<std::vector<double>> &, // (input/output) U factor
78  std::vector<std::vector<double>> * // (input/optional) permutation matrix
79 );
80 
81 template<size_t m>
82 unsigned int factorizeLU( // LU decomposition of matrix
83  std::array<std::array<double, m>, m> &, // (input) Input matrix
84  std::array<std::array<double, m>, m> &, // (input/output) L factor
85  std::array<std::array<double, m>, m> &, // (input/output) U factor
86  std::array<std::array<double, m>, m> * // (input/optional) permutation matrix
87 );
